CheckStatusReasonType.title: check_status_reason_type
CheckStatusReasonType.description: The type of the status reason

RequestType.title: request_type
RequestType.description: The type of HTTP method used for the check

CheckStatusReason.title: check_status_reason
CheckStatusReason.description: Reason for the status, primarily used for failure

description.description: A human readable description of the status reason

start_us.description: Start of the timing, timestamp in microseconds.

duration_us.description: Duration of the timing, in microseconds

RequestDurations.title: request_durations
RequestDurations.description: Durations of each operation in the request

dns_lookup.description: Total time from request initiation until DNS resolution completes.

tcp_connection.description: Time to establish a TCP connection (excluding TLS).

tls_handshake.description: Time spent on the TLS handshake.

time_to_first_byte.description: Time from request start to receiving the first response header byte.

send_request.description: Time spent sending the request (per OTEL conventions).

receive_response.description: Time spent receiving the response (per OTEL).

RequestInfo.title: request_info
RequestInfo.description: Additional information about each request made

request_body_size_bytes.description: Size of the request body in bytes (per OTEL).

response_body_size_bytes.description: Size of the response body in bytes (per OTEL).

request_duration_us.description: Total measured duration for this specific request in microseconds. This is the actual wall clock time and may differ from summing individual timing components.

CheckResult.title: check_result
CheckResult.description: A message containing the result of the uptime check.

guid.description: Unique identifier of the uptime check

subscription_id.description: Identifier of the subscription that this check was run for

trace_id.description: Trace ID associated with the check-in made

span_id.description: Span ID associated with the check-in made. This is a phantom span generated by the uptime-checker, no real span is ingested.

scheduled_check_time_ms.description: Timestamp in milliseconds of when the check was schedule to run

actual_check_time_ms.description: Timestamp in milliseconds of when the check was actually ran

duration_ms.description: Duration of the check in ms. Will be null when the status is missed_window

request_info_list.description: List of all request attempts, in order of execution

region.description: The region that this check was performed in
